BoxBoat Technologies | Kubernetes, Jenkins, Docker, IaaS Expert | DC | REMOTE, FULL-TIME, VISA | https://boxboat.com | careers@boxboat.com

BoxBoat helps global companies develop, integrate, and deploy applications faster with emerging technologies, most notably Kubernetes.

Solutions Architect and DevOps Engineer positions open

Candidates bring deep technical expertise with a self-starter passion to enable successful adoption of containers and distributed technologies in customer environments. They are problem solvers at heart, coders and scripters for work and play, and above all understand the impact containerization, infrastructure, and automation can bring to a DevOps workflow.

401k, Healthcare benefits, Industry-experts staff, and ability to implement cutting edge technologies and frameworks.
